title: Learning to Debug Without Crying
summary: Every dev hits a wall — here’s how to deal with bugs, log smarter, and stop blaming yourself for semicolons.
author: Julia

body.raw: The bug isn't always where you think it is. Learn how to debug step-by-step, how to avoid rabbit holes, and when to ask for help (hint: sooner than you think).
